Interface PageCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.utils.SoftValueHashMap.ValueCache
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LivePageCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LivePageCacheImpl

    public interface PageCache
extends org.apache.activemq.utils.SoftValueHashMap.ValueCache
    A PageCache
    Author:
    Clebert Suconic

      long getPageId()

      void lock()
      When the cache is being created, We need to first read the files before other threads can get messages from this.

      void unlock()
      You have to call this method within the same thread you called lock
